posts.text:
Metabox/Clevo P650SG AKA Sager NP8652
Processor: i7-4720HQ Quad Core (6MB Cache, 2.6GHz up to 3.6GHz)
Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 980M 4GB VRAM
Display: 15.6" FHD 1920x1080 IPS Matte LED
M.2 mSATA: Samsung 850 EVO 500GB M.2 SATA3 SSD
RAM: 16GB DDR3 1600Mhz RAM (2 x 8GB)
WiFi: Intel 7265 AC Dual Band Wireless and Bluetooth
Windows OS: Windows 10 Pro
Just over 3 years old, still going strong, battery still holds 4+ hours when GFX card not being used. Has space to install 2.5" HDD along side M2 SSD. SSD still healthy, 10% of TBW used, recently benched at 545/520.
Taken very good care of this baby, it has traveled around the world with me a few times but have settled here and no longer need it. I recently cleaned out the interior and re-pasted the GPU and CPU. The 980M has aged well, runs new AAA titles at decent settings/frame rates. Easily runs Fortnite, DOTA, LoL.
Looking for 
110k
 
90k
edit: Photos 
https://photos.app.goo.gl/vtLuzi8UgGc9rik68
 or 
https://imgur.com/a/H67zrLw

https://photos.app.goo.gl/vtLuzi8UgGc9rik68
It's relatively thin for it's power. Not like those massive Alienware gaming laptops. The extended battery life comes from Nvidia Optimus which powers down the discrete GPU when it's not being used. However this does mean that it can't support a G-Sync monitor if you were to order a replacement from China.
Added to OP too. Obviously has a power brick too, can get pics of that if you want

https://imgur.com/a/H67zrLw
Uploaded to imgur. Does this one work?

The branding on this one is Metabox, however internationally they are known as Sager and Clevo.
They are an ODM that exclusively makes customisable laptops. Xotic PC in the US sell these laptops under the brand Sager.
Bump, will consider offers. Just collecting dust atm.
